pos_mean_info_list.mean: 秘书处；书记处；秘书（书记，部长等）之职
书记、秘书等的职务或任期

word_group.brief_definition: 副秘书；副书记；副国务卿
常务秘书；常任秘书；常设秘书
联赛秘书长；联盟秘书长
高中秘书；中学书记；高中干事

bilingual.source: If you can type quickly, you can be a secretary.
bilingual.target: 如果你打字快，你可以当秘书。

bilingual.source: Does a private secretary work for a manager or a teacher?
bilingual.target: 私人秘书是为经理还是教师工作？

bilingual.source: He dictated a letter to the secretary.
bilingual.target: 他口述了一封信给秘书。

bilingual.source: He is very proficient in secretary work.
bilingual.target: 他对秘书工作非常熟练。
秘书热情地迎接了来访者。

bilingual.source: She has a lot of experience in secretary work.
bilingual.target: 她对秘书工作有很多经验。

list.abstract: 《Secretary》是由歌手Cherish演唱的一首英文歌曲，于2011年12月1日发行，收录于专辑《2011年12月欧美新歌速递》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Mom. No, that's just my secretary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈，不是，她只是我的秘书。

yingyinNormal.en: No, silly willy. We've been tracking your little secretary/mascot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，你这个笨蛋，我们一直在跟踪你们的小秘书兼吉祥物。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't mind. I'll cancel them. I would never miss my secretary's birthday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不介意，我可以取消，我不想错过我秘书的生日。

yingyinNormal.en: The UN Secretary General thinks we need more music, and I think he's right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 联合国秘书长认为，我们需要更多音乐，我认为他是对的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you handled the operation in Tbilisi very well. Thanks. For a secretary. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 第比利斯的行动你就做得不错。谢谢。就一个秘书而言。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Now the UN secretary general Ban Ki-moon said: There are no languages required in a musical world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 联合国秘书长潘基文说，在音乐的世界里，不需要语言。

yingyinNormal.en: Secretary general has a thing for redheads. Auburn does suit you. Pity. Sarah retired.
yingyinNormal.zh: 联合国秘书长喜欢红发。赤褐色很适合你。可惜啊，莎拉退休了。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe he's taken. And ignore the fact that he's shagging his secretary within five years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信他已经有主了。而且无视他五年内就会搞上他秘书的事实。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to make sure the Secretary General doesn't say anything until we have a better handle of this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要保证联合国秘书长保持沉默直至我们找到更好的解决办法。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm more of a glorified secretary. I think Mayor Lionheart just wanted the sheep vote.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实就是个名头响亮点的秘书而已，我觉得狮心市长只是为了拉来绵羊的选票。

yingyinNormal.en: I called the department secretary to see what happened. Apparently, I have a reputation for being obnoxious.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我打电话问学院秘书是怎么回事，显然，全校的人都认为我很讨厌。

yingyinNormal.en: Why am I listed as your executive assistant? Because the word "Secretary" has fallen into disrepute.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么我被列为你的行政助理？因为"秘书"这个词已经变得不大光彩了。

yingyinNormal.en: Do not trot out your Secretary of State. Voting cannot resume. Now, if you have any doubt, you swallow it right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别放你的秘书长出去。投票不能重启。如果你还有什么疑虑，那也给我忍着。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me lock in that trade right now and get back to you with my secretary with an exact confirmation. Sound good, John?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这就去把这笔交易定下来再让我秘书和你进一步确认，可以吧，John？

yingyinNormal.en: If Petrov doesn't cooperate, the Secretary General will call an emergency session the moment we land in the States.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要是佩特罗夫不买账，等我们一到美国，联合国秘书长就会立即召开紧急会议。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello? Tanya, put him on the line. Hang on, let me see if I can get him. He's my Secretary of State, and he has the power to do it. Well, then you need to tell him what to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好？塔妮娅，让他接电话。等一下，我看看能不能找到他。他是我的州秘书长，他有权这么做。那你得告诉他做什么。

yingyinNormal.en: And what word would you use, Mr. Secretary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会用哪个词，国务卿先生？

yingyinNormal.en: Could you give us a few moments, Madam Secretary?
yingyinNormal.zh: 您能让我们单独谈谈吗，国务卿女士？

yingyinNormal.en: You don't interrupt a meeting with the Secretary of State.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能打断我和国务卿的会面。

yingyinNormal.en: Her presence undermines my authority as Secretary of State.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她的在场会削弱我作为国务卿的权威。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an official in charge of a government department

examination_example.sentence: Jeremy Wright, the culture <highlight>secretary</highlight>, should welcome this positive, hope-filled proposal, and tum it into action.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 文化部长杰里米·赖特应该欢迎这一积极的、充满希望的提议，并将其付诸行动。

examination_example.sentence: The Navy Department moved into the east wing in 1879, where elaborate wall and ceiling stenciling and marquetry floors decorated the office of the <highlight>Secretary</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海军部于1879年迁入东翼，其部长办公室里装饰着精心设计的墙壁、镂花的天花板和镶嵌的地板。

examination_example.sentence: Winston Churchill once walked its corridors and Japanese emissaries met here with <highlight>Secretary</highlight> of State Cordell Hull after the bombing of Pearl Harbor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 温斯顿·丘吉尔曾走过它的长廊；日本使节在珍珠港轰炸事件后也在这里会见了国务大臣科德尔·赫尔。

sense_info_list.en: a person employed by an individual or in an office to assist with correspondence, keep records, make appointments, and carry out similar tasks

word_usage.usage:
secretary常和介词to或of连用，表示“……的秘书”，接人时常用to，接物时常用of。例：
He is secretary to the Governor.
他是政府官员的一名秘书。
Secretary of the Treasury
财政部长

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage:
secretary为可数名词，当secretary表示唯一职务时，其前不加定冠词。
(1) “…(人)的秘书”用secretary to表达。
示例：他是校长的秘书。
误 He is the secretary of the headmaster.
正 He is secretary to the headmaster.
(2) “(单位/机构)的秘书”，用secretary of。
示例：她是一个协会的秘书。
She is secretary of an association.

secretary表“部长, 大臣”时，首字母须大写。
示例：英国外交大臣
the British Foreign Secretary

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

sense_info_list.en: an official in charge of a government department
a person employed by an individual or in an office to assist with correspondence; keep records; make appointments; and carry out similar tasks

examination_example.sentence: Mayor council <highlight>secretary</highlight> Donna Barr said the vote was largely symbolic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 市长委员会秘书唐娜·巴尔表示，这次投票主要是象征性的。

examination_example.sentence: My <highlight>secretary</highlight> told me you were having some problems with the wooden table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的秘书告诉我你的木桌有些问题。

示例：英国外交大臣

secretary为可数名词，当secretary表示唯一职务时，其前不加定冠词。
(1) “…(人)的秘书”用secretary to表达。
示例：他是校长的秘书。
误 He is the secretary of the headmaster.
正 He is secretary to the headmaster.
(2) “(单位/机构)的秘书”，用secretary of。
示例：她是一个协会的秘书。

examination_example.sentence: Dr. Rowan, whose <highlight>secretary</highlight> resigned two weeks ago, has had to do all his own typing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗文博士的秘书两周前辞职了，他不得不自己打字。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a person employed by an individual or in an office to assist with correspondence, keep records, make appointments, and carry out similar tasks

examination_example.sentence: Olivia asked her <highlight>secretary</highlight> if the exhibition would be held in Shanghai ．
examination_example.sentence_trans: Olivia问她的秘书展览是否会在上海举行。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>secretary</highlight> apologized to the manager for making the same mistake again.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 秘书因为再次犯了同样的错误而向经理道歉。

word_usage.usage:
secretary为可数名词，当secretary表示唯一职务时，其前不加定冠词。
(1) “…(人)的秘书”用secretary to表达。
示例：他是校长的秘书。
误 He is the secretary of the headmaster.
正 He is secretary to the headmaster.
(2) “(单位/机构)的秘书”，用secretary of。
示例：她是一个协会的秘书。
She is secretary of an association.

secretary表“部长, 大臣”时，首字母须大写。
示例：英国外交大臣
the British Foreign Secretary
